title: Smoked tofu, wild rice & pomegranate salad

ingredients.item: 200g pack cavolo nero, stalks removed, leaves chopped
250g pack Waitrose Spelt, Quinoa, Red Rice & Wild Rice
1 Waitrose British Blacktail Medium Free Range Egg, hard boiled then peeled and quartered

instructions.step: Warm the oil in a large saucepan over a high heat. Add the cavolo nero, fry for 4 minutes until slightly crispy then season.
Cook the spelt mix according to the pack instructions. Combine with the cavolo nero, pesto and chives. Divide between 2 plates, top with the tofu, egg and pomegranate seeds. Season and serve.
